channel.title: Weirdest problem ever! help!
channel.description:
i am almost done with my server so i try and test it by loging in with 2 accounts on the same pc. so i have 1 guy kill another. to simplify my question, the 2 people will be represented as a and b. so A kills B. (i have both screens open each taking up half the screen)
now heres the problem. on A's screen, player B is still standing there after he was killed. on player B's screen, he teled to the bank like he was supposed to. i couldnt fix it. on 1 screen theres a guy in the bank and in the other hes next to a guy. help! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2008, 01:44:09 AM[/size][hr]sorry i posted this 2 times. i though the first didnt work

item.title: Weirdest problem ever! help!
item.dc:creator: @am159 am159
item.description:
@am159 wrote:

it was tested on 2 pc’s when this happened

Read full topic

item.title: Weirdest problem ever! help!
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

this is coused by what i call ‘client fusion’, its when two clients are opened of the same source with the same cache type. It couses a lag throu the client that isnt very noticable. It is lag, you shouldnt worry about, if your gonig to test, get someone to test WITH you and dont test on 2 accounts. Then you can completly check correctly

Read full topic

item.title: Weirdest problem ever! help!
item.dc:creator: @am159 am159
item.description:
@am159 wrote:

no its noT. people were kiling pps that arent there. its a mess

Read full topic

item.title: Weirdest problem ever! help!
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

This Is Just Lag Don’t Worry About It
